problem.markdown:
>>In what format does edX supply log data?<< (!) XML {{ timely feedback -- explain why an almost correct answer is wrong }} (x) json ( ) CSV ( ) Excel
[explanation] EdX courses are written in XML, generate log data in JSON format, and supply some student data in CSV format to instructors. [explanation]
problem.p: In what format does edX supply log data?

choicegroup.label: In what format does edX supply log data?
choicegroup.choice: XML timely feedback -- explain why an almost correct answer is wrong

div.p: EdX courses are written in XML, generate log data in JSON format, and supply some student data in CSV format to instructors.
